articles.author: John Varga
articles.title: Diana left 'traumatised' by Charles' odd reply at engagement - 'Threw me completely' - Express
articles.description: PRINCESS Diana admitted that she was left 'traumatised' by Prince Charles' reply to a journalist during their engagement announcement.
